plugin.commands.name: Date as zID
plugin.commands.description: Generates a Zettelkasten ID from a Date.

plugin.commands.name: ISO Date as zID
plugin.commands.description: Generates a Zettelkasten ID from an ISO Date.

plugin.commands.name: Generate zID
plugin.commands.description: Generates a Zettelkasten ID using the current date and time (to the second).

plugin.commands.name: ZID to Date
plugin.commands.description: Returns the YYYY-MM-DD date string from a supplied zID.

plugin.settings.title: ZID Radix (Base)
plugin.settings.description:
Set the radix (base) to be used when generating number/date based Zettelkasten IDs.
36 is the default, and is the maximum supported, the lower the base the longer the resulting ID.

NOTE: Changing this setting can result in incorrect conversions of existing zIDs back to a date value.

plugin.settings.title: Log Level
plugin.settings.description: Set how much output will be displayed for this plugin in the NotePlan > Help > Plugin Console. DEBUG is the most verbose; NONE is the least (silent).
